title: Liam Hemsworth's girlfriend Maddison Brown jokes she'd 'f**k Chris Hemsworth' in old clip
text:
Liam Hemsworth is moving on from Miley Cyrus with new girlfriend Maddison Brown, but he may want to steer clear of introducing her to the family just yet as it sounds like she’s got a big ol’ crush on his brothers as well.

Who hasn’t though, right?

In June Maddison appeared on the Zach Sang Show and during a game of ‘f**k, kill, marry’ she outright insisted that she would be down to ‘f**k the Hemsworth brothers but at the same time, the both of them’.

We’re assuming she meant Liam and his older brother Chris, but maybe she meant Chris and Luke? Who knows.

‘I am going to kill Hugh Jackman, I am going marry Margot Robbie as I would like to f**k her for life, and then I will f**k the Hemsworth brothers but at the same time the both of them,’ she told Zach.

But bad news Liam, she may not be the marrying type, as she added: ‘I couldn’t marry them.

‘I would be too insecure, I’d just be like “you’re too attractive you cannot leave the house”.’

‘I will f**k the Hemsworth brothers but the same time the both of them,’ she said (Picture: Youtube)

Liam was snapped on Thursday holding hands with Dynasty actress Maddison, two months after he separated from wife of eight months, Miley.

After hiding out in Byron Bay for weeks, the 29-year-old was papped in New York City – and he wasn’t alone.

Liam hid out in Byron Bay for a few weeks with his brothers (Picture: Instagram)

Liam was seen holding hands with fellow Aussie Maddison as they walked over a zebra crossing, and we don’t think the actor was just guiding her over the road.

Later in the evening the pair were snapped again after a night out with pals, passionately kissing in the street with no care for who was watching.

Maddison is best known for playing Kirby Anders on the Dynasty reboot, and also had a role in Strangerland opposite Nicole Kidman.

Maddison is a 22-year-old actress (Picture: Getty Images)

It’s no surprise that Hemsworth has chosen to get back on the dating scene, considering his ex is onto her second post-marriage relationship.

Miley, 26, was pictured kissing Kaitlynn Carter as news of her split from Liam broke, and the girls went on to date for a month before parting ways.

Now, the We Can’t Stop singer is hooking up with Cody Simpson, even calling the Aussie musician her ‘boyfriend’ after he visited her in the hospital while she was recovering from tonsillitis.

Miley has been sharing selfies with her beau all over social media, so we doubt she’ll be too peeved that Liam is out here holding hands with a new girl.
